translations: 华丽服饰；全套甲胄，全副盔甲

sentences.sentence: He was attended, as are all heads of state, by a full panoply of experts.
sentences.translation: 他像所有的国家领导人一样，在一大群专家的簇拥下出现了。

sentences.sentence: This martial panoply belonged to the true prince--a recent present from Madam Parr the Queen.
sentences.translation: 这套甲胄属于真正的王子——它是女王巴尔夫人最近送给他的礼物。

sentences.sentence: A good deal of his blustering spirit seemed to have evaporated with the removal of his fine panoply.
sentences.translation: 随着他脱去他精致的一身行头，他那狂暴的精神似乎消失了许多。
